column4: it's a mechanism for storing authentication tokens for the ICE interprcess communication protocol
What is an »uthentication token«? RFC2828 does not know such a term.
What is an »authentication token«? RFC2828 does not know such a term.

say you're running 500 J2EE application servers...you don't want to have to go to 500 different machines to look at the logs.  That's a tool that collects the logs and lets you look at them in one place
Thank you very much for explaining and your help.
